question: Learn how you can get the diagnosis and treatment you need to get back to the way you used to look and feel. Dr. Holtorf will answer your questions and share valuable information concerning your health. Kent Holtorf, M.D. will answer your questions about Diabetes, Hypothyroid or other Endocrine questions, on June 29, 2011 from 10am – 11am (Pacific Time).Register here and ask your question. We'll send you an e-mail reminder, too!http://www.medhelp.org/health_chats/register/63We look forward to seeing you soon!Free Live Health Chat:Weight Gain and Diabetes: Is Your Thyroid To Blame?Wednesday Jun 29, 2011, 01:00PM - 02:00PM (EST)Best,MedHelp and your Diabetes Community Leader
title: Free Live Health Chat:   Weight Gain and Diabetes: Is Your Thyroid To Blame? Wednesday Jun 29, 2011, 01:00PM - 02:00PM (EST)
